PERMA is a theory of wellbeing. It stands for Positive Emotion, Engagement, Relationships, Meaning, and Accomplishments. I can tell you more about any of those if you like.

Positive emotion is more than happiness. It includes things like hope, interest, joy, love, compassion, pride, amusement, and gratitude. And they don't just happen to you! You can actually learn to cultivate these emotions.
Engagement similar to the concept of "flow" where you are completely absorbed in an activity.
Relationships includes all the interactions you have with friends, family, colleagues, and your community.
Meaning is the idea that the things you are doing have sense of value and worth.
When PERMA talks about accomplishments, it doesn't mean things other people acknowledge as success. It means working towards and reaching goals that are important to you.
